import React, { Component } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faSun } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default class WeatherDay extends Component { state = { currentWeather : '24', days : [ {id:'1',day: 'Monday', min: '13', max:'34'}, {id:'2',day: 'Tuesday', min: '13', max:'34'}, {id:'3',day: 'Wednesday', min: '13', max:'34'}, {id:'4',day: 'Thursday', min: '13', max:'34'}, {id:'5',day: 'Friday', min: '13', max:'34'}, ] } render() { const {days} = this.state; const dayInformation = days.length ? ( days.map(day =>{ return (
{/* */} {day.name} {/* */}

Low: {day.min}° F

High: {day.max}° F

) }) ) : (
No posts yet
); return (
 
Boston
67° F
WIND: 22 km/h
 
{daysInformation} {/*

MONDAY

Low: 23° F

High: 77° F

Tue

Wed

Mon

Mon

*/}
) } }
